attributes.action: Provide NHS workers free hospital parking beyond covid-19 as a thankyou
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff deserve more than a round of applause at 8pm. They deserve to park at their place of work for free, indefinitely.
attributes.background: A temporary lift on NHS staff having to pay for expensive car parking during the covid-19 outbreak is welcome. The feedback from the general public however is one of dismay. Why are they charged in the first instance ?
